# Vendor Directory

Place Halio SDK installers here.

## Supported Formats
- `.deb` - Debian package  
- `.sh` - Shell installer script
- `.tar.gz` - Compressed archive
- `.zip` - ZIP archive

## Usage
1. Download Halio SDK from vendor
2. Place installer file(s) in this directory
3. Run: `sudo ./scripts/install-halio-sdk.sh`

The installation script will automatically detect and install from files in this directory.
